name: PerfectHomeComfort
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
1. When using Alexa, you need to bind the device in the Perfect Home Comfort APP first, so that you can use the Alexa speaker to awaken the bound device. 
2. You can say "Alexa, please turn off the air conditioner" to Alexa, it will turn off the air conditioner, and the core evoked vocabulary is "turn off the air conditioner"; or "Alexa, set [device name] temperature to 28 degree", it can also To help you set the temperature of a certain device to 28°C, the core evocative vocabulary is "set [device name] temperature to 28 degree", where [device name] stands for a certain device bound to Perfect Home Comfort, using the your name.
3. You can read the detailed instructions for binding Alexa in the Perfect Home Comfort APP to help you use it.
